characteristic.name: Relative Value in a Period of Day
characteristic.description:
The Relative Value in a Period of Day characteristic is used to represent the combination of the Percentage 8 characteristic and two instances of the Time Decihour 8 characteristic.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.description: Refer to Time Decihour 8 characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.time_decihour_8}
Refer to Time Decihour 8 characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.time_decihour_8}
